<color=#ffca0a>СТАНЦИЯ:</color> Управление станцией неизвестному кораблю Zirax, вы нарушаете Гражданское соглашение о свободной торговле . Отойдите на расстояние 10 000 метров и объявите о своей цели.
<color=#ff0000>НЕИЗВЕСТНЫЙ ЗИРАКС:</color> Мы корабль из дома Абиссал Империи Зиракс. Мы проведем сканирование вашей станции. Любое вмешательство приведет к немедленному уничтожению вашей станции.
<color=#ffca0a>СТАНЦИЯ:</color> Отрицательно. У тебя здесь нет авторитета. CFTA ясно-
<color=#ff0000>НЕИЗВЕСТНЫЙ ZIRAX:</color> Это вы нарушаете. Наше сканирование обнаружило инфекцию терранского происхождения на борту вашей станции. Вы должны прекратить весь входящий и исходящий трафик на вашей станции и немедленно ввести блокировку, иначе мы откроем огонь.
@p9 @d0<color=#ffca0a>СТАНЦИЯ:</color> Мы являемся законной гражданской торговой станцией. . Пожалуйста, у нас нет оружия. Мы введем медицинский карантин!
<color=#ff0000>НЕИЗВЕСТНЫЙ ЗИРАКС:</color> Слишком поздно. Мы возьмем на абордаж и очистим вашу станцию. Вы заплатите за свою ошибку, чтобы помочь терранам своими жизнями.
<color=#ffffff>КОНЕЦ ЖУРНАЛА.</color>

English: @d0Communications log entry 17447-A2: STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY APPROACH OR DOCK. STATION: ALERT TO ALL NEARBY VESSELS. STATION IS UNDER QUARANTINE. NO VESSEL MAY- @p9 @d0The signal appears to cut off and be replaced by a new one containing only a single word: Awaken The signal seems to be transmitted on a high frequency subspace band directed at a star system called Hades.
Russian: @d0Запись в журнале связи 17447-A2: СТАНЦИЯ: ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ ДЛЯ ВСЕХ БЛИЖАЙШИХ СУДОВ. СТАНЦИЯ НА КАРАНТИНЕ. НИКАКОЕ СУДНО НЕ МОЖЕТ ПРИБЛИЖАТЬСЯ ИЛИ ПРИЧАЛИВАТЬСЯ. СТАНЦИЯ: ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ ДЛЯ ВСЕХ НАХОДЯЩИХСЯ СУДОВ. СТАНЦИЯ НА КАРАНТИНЕ. НИКАКОЕ СУДНО НЕ МОЖЕТ ПРИБЛИЖАТЬСЯ ИЛИ ПРИЧАЛИВАТЬСЯ. СТАНЦИЯ: ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ ДЛЯ ВСЕХ НАХОДЯЩИХСЯ СУДОВ. СТАНЦИЯ НА КАРАНТИНЕ. НИКАКОЕ СУДНО НЕ МОЖЕТ ПРИБЛИЖАТЬСЯ ИЛИ ПРИЧАЛИВАТЬСЯ. СТАНЦИЯ: ПРЕДУПРЕЖДЕНИЕ ДЛЯ ВСЕХ НАХОДЯЩИХСЯ СУДОВ. СТАНЦИЯ НА КАРАНТИНЕ. НИКАКОЕ СУДНО НЕ МОЖЕТ- @p9 @d0Сигнал обрывается и заменяется новым, содержащим только одно слово: Awaken Сигнал кажется для передачи в высокочастотном подпространственном диапазоне, направленном на звездную систему под названием Аид.

English: @d0The encrypted station communication log has been placed in your personal or connected inventory.
Russian: @d0Зашифрованный журнал связи со станцией был помещен в ваш личный или подключенный инвентарь.

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 1 player. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Russian: @d0Системы пожаротушения отключены. Блокировка снята. Установлена сложность для 1 игрока. Сложность увеличивает количество врагов, но не влияет на награды. Сложность в режиме COOP установлена на 1 выше из-за технической проблемы.

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 2 players. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Russian: @d0Системы пожаротушения отключены. Блокировка снята. Установлена сложность для 2 игроков. Сложность увеличивает количество врагов, но не влияет на награды. Сложность в режиме COOP установлена на 1 выше из-за технической проблемы. >

English: @d0Fire suppression systems have been disabled. Lockdown lifted. Difficulty set to 3+ players. Difficulty increases number of enemies but has no effect on rewards. Difficulty in COOP mode is set 1 higher due to a technical issue.
Russian: @d0Системы пожаротушения отключены. Блокировка снята. Установлена сложность: 3+ игрока. Сложность увеличивает количество врагов, но не влияет на награды. Сложность в кооперативном режиме установлена на 1 выше из-за технической проблемы.

English: @d0This cargo container may contain valuable goods.\nMake sure you are connected via logistics to a storage container with plenty of free space.
Russian: @d0Этот грузовой контейнер может содержать ценные товары.\nУбедитесь, что вы подключены через логистику к контейнеру для хранения с большим количеством свободного места.

English: @d0This console controls the fire suppression system that is keeping the inner hangar doors closed.\nDisabling it should allow access to the rest of the station.
Russian: @d0Эта Консоль управляет системой пожаротушения, которая держит внутренние двери ангара закрытыми. Отключение должно открыть доступ к остальной части станции. Поблизости также находится мертвый охранник с панелью данных, на которой написано следующее: Они в вентиляции! В потолке! Не используйте свои реактивные ранцы и не подходите к ним слишком близко, иначе они вылезут наружу!

English: Play Alexander Jordan - A New Beginning.
@d0This controls the ambient music played throughout the ship.
Russian: @d0Управляет фоновой музыкой, воспроизводимой по всему кораблю.

English: @d0This controls the video played on the briefing room screen.\n\nNote: internet access required for some video.
Russian: @d0Управляет воспроизведением видео на экране брифинг-зала.\n\nПримечание: для некоторых видео требуется доступ в Интернет.

English: Some schematics you can purchase from me.\nOthers you may rarely find in valuable containers, from mission rewards, or other traders.
Russian: Некоторые схемы вы можете приобрести у меня.\nДругие редко можно найти в ценных контейнерах, в наградах за миссии или у других торговцев.

English: I want to ask something else.
@d0This organism looks delicate. Taking a sample may destroy it.
Russian: @d0Этот организм выглядит хрупким. Взятие образца может разрушить его.

English: @d0There is nothing more to find here.
@d0The scanner appears to be calibrated for biological samples.\nPerhaps presenting it with an interesting sample will open the door? You might find a suitable sample somewhere in this cave.
Russian: @d0Сканер, по всей видимости, откалиброван на биологические образцы.\nПопробуйте представить ему интересный образец и может он разблокирует дверь? Вы можете найти подходящий образец где-нибудь в этой пещере.

English: @d0The scanner appears interested in the sample you presented and opens the door.\nIn the process of scanning the sample was destroyed.
Russian: @d0Сканер сработал на представленный вами образец и открыл дверь.\nВ процессе сканирования образец был уничтожен.

English: @d0The scanner does not appear interested in what you offered.
Russian: @d0Сканирующее устройство, не реагирует на то, что вы ему предложили.

English: Offer a drop of your own blood. <color=#ff0000>(-5hp)</color>

@d0TO DO LIST:
- Clean airshaft 4.
- Wipe down conduits.
- Clean bathroom floor.
Russian:
@d0СПИСОК НЕОБХОДИМЫХ ДЕЛ:
– Очистить вентиляционную шахту 4.
– Протереть трубы.
– Вымыть пол в ванной.

English: @d0<color=#ffca0a>I don't know how they expect us to keep working like this. We have been pulling double and even triple shifts for weeks. The men are exhausted. Someone is going to make a mistake.</color>
Russian: @d0<color=#ffca0a>Я не понимаю, почему они ожидают, что мы будем продолжать работать в том же духе. Мы уже несколько недель работаем в две и даже в три смены. Персонал истощен. Кто-то обязательно совершит ошибку.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ffca0a>It has happened. There was a containment breach and the bean counters in the control room activated the fail safe.</color>\n<color=#ffca0a>The robotic guards activated and have been hunting down anything that moves. I fear I may be next.</color>
Russian: @d0<color=#ffca0a>Это случилось. Произошло нарушение целостности защитной оболочки и люди в диспетчерской активировали аварийную защиту.</color>\n<color=#ffca0a>Роботы-охранники активировались и охотятся за всем, что движется. Боюсь, я могу быть следующим.</color>

English: @d0<color=#ff0000>Control Station is in lock down mode. Security key required.</color>
Russian: @d0<color=#ff0000>Панель управления находится в режиме блокировки. Требуется электронный ключ.</color>

English: \n@d0Work order request for worker 53958430489-B9:The ventilator in ventilation shaft 7 is making a funny noise and interrupting worker sleep. Please repair or replaced as needed.Security access code is {SecurityKey}. Do not give this key to anyone.
Russian: \n@d0Запрос рабочего задания для работника 53958430489-B9: Вентилятор в вентиляционной шахте 7 издает странный шум и мешает рабочему спать. При необходимости отремонтируйте или замените его.Защитный код доступа — {SecurityKey}. Никому не давайте этот ключ.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 1:\nToday was a good day. We got the operation up and running much faster than expected. We should be ready to extract the first cryo pod by the end of the week.\nI cannot foresee any complications.
Russian: @d0Журнал главного научного сотрудника 1:\nСегодня был хороший день. Мы запустили операцию намного быстрее, чем ожидалось. Мы должны быть готовы извлечь первую криокамеру к концу недели.\nЯ не вижу никаких осложнений.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 2:\nThere were minor power fluctuations in the grid earlier today. Probably due to a power conduit being out of alignment.\nI have assigned a technician to do a full diagnostic on the grid. The last thing we need is a power failure in the middle of our extraction process.
Russian: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 2:\nСегодня в сети были незначительные колебания напряжения. Вероятно, из-за того, что силовой кабель не выровнен.\nЯ поручил техническому специалисту провести полную диагностику сети. Последнее, что нам нужно, это сбой питания в середине нашего процесса извлечения.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 3:\nI have instituted mandatory double shifts for all employees. We fell behind schedule after several members of the team stayed in their bunks after complaining of being sick.\nWe do not have any medical facilities so if they want to be good for nothing lazy bums they can wait for the next transport back to a station.
Russian: @d0Журнал главного научного сотрудника 3:\nЯ ввел обязательные двойные смены для всех сотрудников. Мы отстали от графика после того, как несколько членов команды остались на своих койках после того, как пожаловались на то, что заболели.\nУ нас нет медицинских учреждений, поэтому, если они хотят быть бесполезными ленивыми бездельниками, они могут дождаться следующего транспорта обратно на станцию. .

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 4:\nThe power fluctuations have gotten worse. And to make a bad situation even worse our chief engineer has quit after complaining of being too sick to work.\nI have put the entire team on mandatory triple shifts. If they don't like it they can take it up with the contract they signed.
Russian: @d0Журнал главного научного сотрудника 4:\nКолебания мощности усилились. И, что еще хуже, наш главный инженер уволился после того, как пожаловался, что слишком болен, чтобы работать.\nЯ перевел всю команду на обязательные трехсменные смены. Если им это не нравится, они могут принять это в соответствии с контрактом, который они подписали.

English: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 5: The cryo pod we have been attempting to safely extract for the past month was dropped and cracked open. I can only assume the entire facility has been compromised and have ordered the code black emergency protocol. The employee handbook mentions this is to be used only in the case of containment failure. Strangely this protocol activated our security droids. I am not sure how much help they will be dealing with a biological hazard like this but I supp The message was abruptly cut short.
Russian: @d0Chief Scientist's Log 5: Криокапсула, которую мы пытались безопасно извлечь в течение последнего месяца, была брошена и взломана. Я могу только предположить, что вся установка была скомпрометирована, и я заказал аварийный протокол с черным кодом. В справочнике для сотрудников упоминается, что его следует использовать только в случае нарушения условий содержания. Как ни странно, этот протокол активировал наших дроидов-охранников. Я не уверен, насколько сильно они помогут справиться с такой биологической опасностью, как эта, но я поддерживаю Сообщение было резко прервано.

English: @d0This door seems to be controlled by a scanner.

@d0Activating this beacon will signal a UCH Research Vessel to warp in to this sector 1000 meters away from your current position.\nMake sure you are far away from any space stations, asteroids, or other obstacles to lower the risk of collision.\nBeacons are one time use. Are you sure you want to activate the beacon?
Russian: @d0Активация этого маяка подаст сигнал исследовательскому кораблю UCH о необходимости ВАРП-прыжка в этот сектор на расстоянии 1000 метров от вашего текущего местоположения.\nУбедитесь, что вы находитесь на необходимой дистанции от любых космических станций, астероидов или других объектов, чтобы снизить риск столкновения.\nМаяк одноразового использования. Вы уверены, что хотите активировать маяк?

English: @d0A UCH Research Vessel was already called to this sector.
Russian: @d0Исследовательское судно UCH уже было вызвано в этот сектор.

English:
@d0<color=#00afff>Hi J, </color>
<color=#00afff>I know you were critical about that whole cult thing, but believe me I was right! There are incredible opportunities for us here!</color>
<color=#00afff>I am standing in front of a machine that can do all sorts of chemical magic to that 'people goo' they are so obsessed with! I am sure I can reconfigure it to create some really hot stuff for our illustrious clients. That will make us rich in no time!</color>
<color=#00afff>Just have to figure out how that thing works...</color>
<color=#00afff>Until we meet again,</color>
<color=#00afff>K</color>
Russian:
@d0<color=#00afff>Hi J,
 Я знаю, что вы критически относились ко всей этой истории с сектой, но поверьте, я был прав! Здесь перед нами открываются невероятные возможности!Я стою перед машиной, которая может творить всевозможную химическую магию с той 'человеческой слизью', которой они так одержимы!
 Я уверен, что смогу изменить его конфигурацию и создать несколько действительно горячих штучек для наших выдающихся клиентов. 
Это сделает нас богатыми в мгновение ока! Надо только понять, как эта штука работает...
 До новых встреч, </color><color=#00afff>K</color>

English: @d0This beacon is a short range radio repeater meant to receive signals and relay it to other locations in the system. It's likely part of a chain of such repeaters.\nIt may be possible to trace the signal back to its source if you activate this beacon, though this will also alert whomever is monitoring the radio network.
Russian: @d0Этот маяк - радиоретранслятор малого радиуса действия, предназначенный для приема сигналов и передачи их в другие точки системы. Скорее всего, он является частью цепи таких ретрансляторов.\nЕсли активировать этот маяк, можно отследить сигнал до его источника, хотя это также привлечёт внимание тех, кто следит за радиосетью.

English: @d0This is another short range radio repeater. You can use it to trace the signal to the next beacon.\nIt appears the generators are rigged to blow if any tampering is detected.
@d0This beacon seems to be the last of the radio repeaters. Activating it will pinpoint the source of the signal and the generators will probably explode like the last one.
Russian: @d0 Кажется, этот маяк - последний из радиоретрансляторов. Активировав его, вы точно определите источник сигнала и генераторы, скорее всего, взорвутся, как это было в прошлый раз.

English: @d0You cannot access this console. There may be a beacon somewhere in this sector you need to activate first.
Russian: @d0 Вы не можете получить доступ к этой консоли. Возможно, где-то в этом секторе есть маяк, который нужно сначала активировать.

English: @d0You were able to obtain the unlock codes for the stash.

@d0@q0Before you can disable the fire suppression system you should check the dead worker's data pad for any information about what's going on.\nPerhaps it will also contain vitally important tactical information that will help you explore the station. You really should read it.
Russian: @d0@q0Прежде чем отключить систему пожаротушения, необходимо проверить блокнот мертвого рабочего на наличие информации о происходящем\n<color=#ffff00>Не исключено, что там будет содержаться важная оперативная информация, которая поможет вам исследовать станцию. Вам необходимо прочитать ее.</color>

English: <color=#00ff00>Read the worker's data pad. (You might live)</color>
Russian: <color=#00ff00>Прочитать блокнот с данными рабочего. (Шансна то,  что сможете выжить)</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>Do not read it. (You will probably die horribly)</color>
Russian: <color=#ff0000>Не читать блокнот. (Вы, вероятно, умрете в мучениях)</color>

English: <color=#00ff00>I understand, IDA, and will follow your tactical advice.</color>
Russian: <color=#00ff00>Понятно, IDA, и я последую твоему совету по тактике.</color>

English: @d0@q0IDA:\nAre you sure you want to skip reading the worker's data pad, Commander? I cannot guarantee your safety if you don't let me analyze it for tactical information. You will be walking in blind and will probably die. Horribly. And slowly. And probably painfully. Don't worry, I will still be here when you wake up in a fresh clone.\nAre you sure you want to skip reading the extremely important data pad?
Russian: @d0@q0IDA:\nВы уверены, что не хотите прочесть планшет этого рабочего, Коммандер? Я не могу гарантировать вашу безопасность, если вы не позволите мне проанализировать его на предмет тактической информации. Вы будете идти вслепую и наверняка умрете от кровавого поноса и других нехороших болезней. Это ужасно. И, думаю, мучительно. Но не волнуйтесь, я все еще буду здесь, когда вы появитесь в новом клоне и совершите очередной суицид.\nИтак. Вы уверены, что хотите пропустить чтение чрезвычайно важного блока данных?

English: <color=#00ff00>Fine. I will read it. Because I don't like dying.</color>
Russian: <color=#00ff00>Уговорил. Я прочту. Потому что я безвольный тюфяк и не люблю умирать.</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>I don't need to read. Let me go in blind and die.</color>
Russian: <color=#ff0000>Отстань. Позволь мне войти вслепую и умереть от неожиданности.</color>

English: @d0This is the primary communications console for the station. Best to leave it alone if you don't know what you're doing.
@d0This is the primary communications console for the station.\nYou should probably contact Traders Guild security and report what happened.

@d0@q0This is Security, what is going on over there?\nYou explain what happened.\nThat is quite the story. Thank you for taking care of the situation. The Traders Guild will happily reimburse you for your time. Please accept this reward of 50,000 credits deposited directly to your account.
@d0This seems to be the bandit commander's data pad.
View contents of the data pad.
I have been waiting for this loader android to get this pallet hooked to the crane forever!\nThese robotic assistants were cheap but they've been giving us nothing but problems since day 1!
I guess you get what you pay for.

Greetings. I am Robotic Loading Assistant RLA-{Eden_NPCName}.\nPlease excuse me as I am currently performing intense mathematical calculations to determine the best weight distribution pattern to lift this cargo pallet with the most efficiency possible according to the known laws of physics.
Thank you, meat bag-I mean, carbon based life form.
I've been waiting in line for 2 hours! 2 hours! How long does it take someone to go to the bathroom?\nI'm about to call security...
I'm terribly sorry to hear that.
I heard someone stole the bathroom key. Can you believe it?\nWhat is the galaxy coming to...

Yes! Or so I heard! From one of the loader androids, who heard it from a dockworker. I think they overheard two officers talking about it and...\nWell you get the point. I bet some smuggler stole it and stashed it somewhere on the station.\n@p9Say, my boss is an influential manager at PentaCorp. If you happen to find the bathroom key lying around somewhere and bring it to me, I'll put in a good word for you, help out your reputation with Polaris. It could be anywhere on this station. What do you say?
<color=#00ff00>Is this the key you are looking for? </color><color=#00ff00>(+150 Polaris Rep)</color>

Yes! YES! This is it!\nNow I just have to wait for these other people to leave the line so I can go in without them noticing otherwise it's going to be a mad stampede!\nDon't you worry I will make sure to tell my boss about your heroic deed today.
Uggghhhh. I really have to go!
Sorry to hear that. Perhaps you should see a doctor about that.
Wait, didn't I already get you the bathroom key?
The alien leans in to whisper.\nGot to keep up appearances you know. Can't let them know that I have it.\nKeep it between us, yes?
Got it. Well, not really, but I got it.
Oh these blue barrels next to me? Deuterium straight from the Solitude region.\nUsed to power all kinds of advanced mining equipment.
Deuterium? How do you mine that?
Deu-what? Too science sounding for me. I'm leaving now.

Easy with some ice mining drills from the Free Colonists. Picked a pair up at one of their scrapyards in a hot star system, or I think there's someone who might sell a schematic to create your own.\nYou will need a heavy duty mining ship with a lot of cargo space however so best go prepared.
Have any tips for ice mining?
Fascinating, but I really must be going.
Thank you for the advice. Good luck to you as well.
Easy... Easy... Just a few centimeters to the left. No, the other left!\nOh, what do you want? Can't you see that I'm busy?
Are you sure it's safe to stand there?
I will leave you alone then.
It's YOUR safety you'll need to worry about if you don't mind your own business!\nNow get lost before I have them drop this barrel on your head!
It's hard work but the pay is decent.
Watch where you're going!\nSheesh. They'll let just anybody in these days.
...The Setesh guard's nose drips. Ha ha ha ha ha ha! Hah hauah!
I worry about all the bandit recent bandit attacks.
These new androids are worthless! They break down every other day.
I heard your kind has research vessels scattered throughout the galaxy. I want to visit one someday.
If I have to listen to my boss complain one more time I am going to throw myself out an airlock!
Freighter captains are so impatient.\nThe alien glares at you.
The last ship I worked on was raided by bandits. I was the only survivor.\nThe manager of this station took me on and gave me a job when everyone else had given up.
If you want to work for Polaris take my advice and don't. The pay might be good but you work long hours and get very few days off.
I love working for Polaris. The pay is good but you do have to work a lot.\nI am saving up to retire on a small moon by the time I'm 140.
Last week a freighter came in with an infestation of space snakes.\nWhat? Don't look at me like that. Space snakes are totally a thing. No, I haven't seen one.
I heard The Syndicate has been hiding supply caches all throughout neutral space.
My job here is simple. Make sure everybody else does their job.
My job is to help coordinate space traffic. If you'll excuse me I should get back to it.
Freighter 6573-A, slow your speed! Repeat, slow your speed! Don't make me tell you again!
I can't give you a tour of operations right now, sorry.
Working in command comes with some nice benefits, such as being able to tell nosy customers like yourself to get lost.
If one more freighter captain calls asking what's their ETA I am going to lose it!
Cargo Shuttle Nomad Aspen, you are now clear for docking. Enjoy your stay.\nOh, hi. What do you want? Can't you see I'm busy?
Someone really needs to find that bathroom key or just cut open the door.
Another freighter got hit by bandits yesterday. That makes 4 in the last week.
You there! Run down to the dock and find out what's taking them so long!\nOh, you're not my employee. My apologies.
Scanning... No contraband detected. Have a pleasant day.
All visitors are required to follow station policy.
Small talk protocol active.\nWhat is for lunch? Did you see the game? How about that weather.\nSmall talk protocol complete.

@d0Welcome to the Project Eden personal settings menu.\nIn this menu you can change certain personal settings within the scenario. If you have an admin access card you may also access global scenario settings.\nPlease note that if your player character data is wiped (such as using the chatbot to reset your character data on a server) these options will also be reset.

@d0This setting can disable some of the random NPC flavor text that shows at the top of the screen when looking at certain NPCs.\nThis will only affect some of the flavor dialog in the Project Eden POIs. It will not affect non-Project Eden POIs or older dialog.\nSome flavor text does give hints and might be useful.
If you're interested in some cash and reputation try taking out some of the local bandits.
I left Polaris to join the Free Colonists and it was the best decision I ever made. I am my own boss now.
I left Polaris to join the Free Colonists and it was the best decision I ever made. I am my own boss now.
The Traders Guild is greedy. Polaris exploits their workers. And the empire is oppressive. Better to strike out on your own.
Be careful if you go exploring the galaxy's edge. Many ships never return.
You can sometimes pick up passengers at orbital habitats who are willing to pay for a ride.
These bandit attacks are getting worse and worse. Just heard my cousin's ice freighter was almost caught in a warp disruption field last week. Barely escaped.
Somebody needs to hunt down all those bandits.
I heard there's someone on a Polaris Distribution Center that has a prototype schematic for powerful mining devices.
Be on the lookout for strange anomalies.
I am glad I came to {Player.PlayfieldName} to look for work. I had a rough first few months but I am starting to get things together.
@d0You must successfully breach the security for both the left and right consoles before you may use this console.
Welcome to our humble home among the stars. I am the manager of this home away from home here in {Player.PlayfieldName}. How may I assist you?
No I am afraid not. Maybe try another habitat.
Thank you for checking. I want to ask something else.

Yes I do have a crew looking for passage to a factory.\nYou will need to be connected via logistics to a cargo hold with at least {Eden_TokenVolume} free space.\nThe receiving station will pay you back for your time. What do you say?
They will have to find another ship to carry them.
I'd rather not chat right now, if it's all the same to you.
Had a long day at work and I just want to relax and watch the news.
{Player.PlayfieldName} has a lovely view of the galaxy, don't you think? I could stare out these windows for hours.
It is way past my bed time...
Did you see another scrapyard was attacked by raiders? Be careful if you go visit one, you never know when more raiders will show up!
The mining opportunities here in {Player.PlayfieldName} are going to dry up sooner or later. I should look into moving.
Check in with the manager if you're looking for crew to hire or transport.
The companies have had us working double shifts to get all these new orbital factories up and running. It's wearing me out. I may ask for some time off to visit my family.
I heard the Traders Guild is building new orbital waste processing facilities in Tranquility.
Polaris Megacorp has commissioned the construction of 200 new orbital alloy smelteries! That's a lot of freight that will need to be moved! Are you a freighter captain?
The Free Colonists might not be the wealthiest, or most powerful, but they make up for it with determination and resourcefulness.
My shuttle to take me to work is late. Again. Try telling that to my boss though!
These quarters are a bit cramped, but the view is nice after a long day at work.
Heard there might be a crew here looking for transportation to an orbital factory. You should check in with the manager.
I really don't think it's a good idea to colonize so close to the Dronelands. Most ships that enter that region of space are never heard from again.
The Traders Guild is considering increasing taxes again! This is outrageous!
@d0These two are involved in a rather heated conversation.
All I'm saying is maybe we shouldn't have come to {Player.PlayfieldName}. We're parents now. We have to think of more than just ourselves.
We needed the money. We talked about this. I was stuck in a dead end job barely making ends meet on a backwater world. And I never got to see you or our child!

It's getting too dangerous. There's bandits and raiders everywhere. Even the local scrapyards aren't safe anymore. Money won't matter if we're dead.\nWhat about X'Chekve? You mentioned he had a lead on a mining job deep inside the Forge? Some kind of new mining tech that can drill rich asteroids?

We don't have the money for transportation! The cheapest transports are asking for 10,000 credits to get anywhere close to the Forge.\n\nThey notice you standing nearby and cut their conversation short.
Maybe I can help you out. Here's 10,000 credits from my bank account, no strings attached.
Oh thank you, kind stranger!\nWe have no way to repay you but we will tell others in the Free Colonists of your kindness.
Thank you again for your help! With the money you gave us, we should be able to book a transport out of here.
I want my money back! <color=#ff0000>(-200 Colonists rep)</color>
Fine, take it. We don't want any trouble. I will transfer it back into your account but I will tell everyone what a scoundrel you are!\nYou're no longer wanted here!
These two individuals stop talking once they notice you.
Have you heard of a planet called Raeu... Raeeourer... Raeourrrar... Raerouae... Raeoureeru? Darnit! I can't pronounce the name and we're supposed to deliver a large shipment of food to them.
Thank you again for your assistance.
Please, take this bank account transfer of 50000 credits.\nI will also speak highly of you to any other Polaris or Colonist mining vessels I encounter in my travels.
Our ship has lost power. There's no way we can make it to the meeting in time now.\nYou best be on your way. There's nothing more you can do.
@q0Thank you for saving our hides! Here, take this payment of 250000 credits as a reward.
Hello. Do you have a question?
What are you doing out here?

I am a member of the executive board for the Traders Guild. Specifically, my job is to open up new trade routes throughout neutral territory to facilitate the flow of goods and services throughout the galaxy.\nAs part of this role I have been working with members of the Free Colonists in a joint effort to increase security in the face of increased pirate activity.
I want to ask something else.

These colonists were escorting us to an important meeting to formalize a new trade agreement that would allow Traders Guild freighters to run supplies for their new fuel refineries.\nIt cannot be understated just how important it is for this new trade agreement to be signed.
I want to ask something else.
Do you know why anyone would intend you harm?
I want to ask something else.

Part of this new trade agreement is an aggressive defense initiative to combat increased criminal activity.
I can only imagine someone learned about this and decided to take me off the board.
@p9We opted to let the Colonists escort our ship, as a Traders Guild escort would draw more attention.
In hindsight I probably should have opted for using our own ships, but the Colonists ships are still quite formidable, if a little old.
I am not ready for payment yet.
The Refinery has lost power. You did what you could.
I'm sorry but I don't have the time. Best of luck!

@q0Thank you for your assistance defending our station. Polaris is in your debt, and as promised I will transfer 500000 credits to your bank account.\nWe also towed in some valuable wreckage from the battle you may be interested in.\n<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected via logistics to a storage container with enough free space to accept it.</color>
I am not ready to take payment yet.
@d0You cannot obtain any more useful information from this console.

@d0Whomever deployed this mine made sure to scrub the mine's computer of any potentially useful information as to their identity.\nHowever they did not delete the mine's manufacturer information. This mine appears to be of Polaris design so perhaps you can find someone on a Polaris Distribution Center that might know more about its origins if you were to bring them the data.
<color=#00ff00>Download data to a mobile data chip.</color>
@d0You download the data onto a data chip that has been placed in your personal or connected inventory.
Can you tell me anything about this mine?
Hand it over and I will take a look.

Interesting. Korvax? Hmm. You said you found this where? It disabled a high end VIP transport for the Traders Guild?
Very interesting. I don't know why anyone would have wanted that VIP dead, but Korvax is a well known name among the less civilized.
All I can tell you is if you're looking for trouble you are on the right path. Here, take these platinum cards for your time.
Bank transfers can be tracked, hence the cards.
Wait, I want to ask something else.
No thanks, keep your money. Goodbye.
@d0Please make your selection.\nNote: Currently not all options are available.
Please make a selection below.\n(This feature is not yet in)
@d0Greetings. How may I be of assistance?
I would like to turn in insignias.
@d0Handing in insignias will reward credits and reputation.\nWhat type and quantity of insignia would you like to turn in?
@d0<color=#ffff00>I'm sorry, you did not have the required insignias.\nMake sure the insignias are in your personal inventory and that you did not try to turn in more than you had.</color>

@d0You turned in <color=#00ffff>{Count}</color> insignias.\nYou received <color=#00ff00>{CreditReward * Count}</color> credits and <color=#00afff>{ReputationReward * Count}</color> reputation with <color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>.
I don't have any insignias. Goodbye.
<color=#00ff00>Turn in ALL of my insignias! </color><color=#ffff00>(experimental feature)</color>

@q0@d0You turned in all of your insignias.\nYou received a total of <color=#00ff00>{LoopCredit}</color> credits and <color=#00afff>{LoopReputation}</color> reputation with <color=#ffffff>{FactionType}</color>.
I want to ask something else.
I want to sell old style insignias.
Our work here is sensitive, I cannot discuss it with you.
I am concerned about the recent increase in raider attacks. It's almost like they are coordinated now.
Our job is to maintain local security and coordinate with other sectors.
If you have any insignias to turn in you should speak with the federation security officer near the hangar.
If you're looking for bounties, check sectors with a high amount of subspace radio signals.
A Polaris refinery was just attacked by raiders! Someone needs to stop them.
There's rumors that some bandit officers are carrying around sealed containers with valuables inside.
Bounty hunting is dangerous work but pays well.
The security officer back by the hangar will accept insignias.
Have you seen these new raiders vessels? They are bigger and far more heavily armed than the ones you might be used to.
We received a priority distress call on a federation emergency channel but the signal source was too far away for us to send any ships to assist.
Thank you for helping me! You have no idea how much it means to me.\n\nThe alien begins crying. At least you think those are tears.

...Well if you won't let me see them at least give them this note! Please I am begging you! @p9The alien seems startled by your presence. Oh, hello. I'm sorry sob about this sob. I have been trying to see my partner who was wrongly imprisoned but they won't let me! Maybe you can help me?
What can I do to help?
I don't get involved with criminals.

My partner was running freight when he was stopped by federation customs agents. They seized his freighter and took him into custody. He's being held here in one of the cells.\nThey won't let me see him and they won't give him my note. Maybe you can convince one of the station's crew to do it? I need him to know how much I love him.
I will try. Give me the note.
Sounds illegal. I won't help you.
That's... Okay. I understand. Thank you anyway. Sob
@q0Thank you! Thank you so much! You have no idea how much this means to me! They told me he is being held in cell 7.
You're welcome. I will make sure he gets your note.
Please find someone who will give my partner my note!\nI am sure there is somebody here who would do that.
Have you heard of our lord and savior Hamster?
Hamsters are illegal. Cute, but illegal.
I want to ask something else.
You could help me with something.
Oh yeah, and what could that possibly be?
I need you to pass this note to the prisoner in cell 7.
And why would I do a thing like that?
Because there might be a little something in it for you.
And what kind of something did you have in mind? Maybe... 5000 of a little something?
I will give you 5000 credits. Cash.
If you wait a moment, I will go to an ATM and get you 5000 credits in cash.
Never mind. The whole thing is too shady for me.
@q0Thank you thank you thank you!\nHere, please, take these credits. It should more than make up for whatever you had to use to bribe the guard.\nMy clan will be in your debt.
You got a death wish or something?
<color=#ff0000>Let's fight. (your body can't take another punch)</color>
Oh sorry, my bad. I will be going.
I don't want to talk to you right now.
Oh sorry. I will leave you alone then.
Did you find someone to bribe? What happened to your face?
Bad news. A guard beat me up and took your note.
Oh, I see your bloody nose.\nWell, I don't have another copy of the note. Thank you anyway.
I was given this suspicious note.

@q0The security chief listens as you explain how you obtained the note.\n@p9 @q0Ah yes, we have had our eyes on them for awhile now. They are, obviously, not partners. At least not in the romantic sense.\nThey are most definitely partners in crime. I would be most grateful on behalf of the Trade Federation if you were to hand this note over to me.
On second thought, I think I will keep it.
@q0Thank you. You will find that being a friend to the federation will open many doors for you.
@d0<color=#ff0000>This radio transmitter has been shut down.\nThere is nothing more you can do here.</color>
@d0<color=#ff0000>Shutdown sequence has already been initiated by another user.</color>

@d0This old long range subspace radio transmitter appears to have been hijacked by bandits and is now being used to coordinate attacks on local shipping lanes.\nShutting it down would help secure the local system but will undoubtedly attract the attention of whomever has been using the transmitter.\n<color=#ffff00>Once the shutdown sequence is started leaving the sector will fail the mission.</color>
@d0<color=#ff0000>You have initiated a shutdown sequence.</color>\n<color=#ff0000>See PDA for current objectives.</color>
@q0 @d0<color=#00ff00>Shutdown sequence ready to complete.</color>\n<color=#ffff00>Make sure you have free space in your personal inventory or connected container.</color>

@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#ff0000>Unknown</color>
Planet must be surveyed for viability before a geological core sample can be taken.
Surveying requires a <color=#00ff00>Basic System Survey Probe</color> in your personal inventory that will be used up to perform the survey.
@d0Launch a survey probe to determine if the planet can support geothermal power generation.
I don't have any probes on me.

@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#00ff00>High</color>
Planet is deemed suitable for geothermal power generation.
Core sample required to activate a geothermal generator. Connect to a container on your base with at least 32000 available volume.
<color=#ffff00>Warning: core samples are too heavy to lift via ship and will require storage in a base. Core samples will quickly cool into unusable rock.</color>

@d0Geological core sample will be deposited into a connected container on a BASE with at least 32000 available volume. While connected to the container that has the core sample, use the upgrade function of a multitool to activate a geothermal generator. There is a maximum to the number of active geothermal generators per base. The core sample will quickly cool into unusable rock. If this happens you will need to obtain another core sample. Note: connect to a BASE cargo container ONLY. Do not use a ship as it can overload the generators.
@q0 @d0Survey complete.\n<color=#00ff00>This planet is suitable for geothermal power generation.</color>\nCore samples can now be obtained from geothermal generators on this planet.
@q0 @d0Survey complete.\n<color=#ffff00>This planet is not suitable for geothermal power generation.</color>

@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Ready</color>
Power Output: <color=#ff0000>None</color>
<color=#00ff00></color>Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#ff0000>Minimal</color>
This planet is not suitable for geothermal power generation.

@d0Status: <color=#00ff00>Active</color>
Power Output: <color=#00ff00>Optimal</color>
Planet name: <color=#00afff>{Player.PlayfieldName}</color>
Geothermal activity: <color=#00ff00>High</color>
This geothermal generator is currently reducing your base's power usage.
Base will still require at least one standard generator and fuel tank or solar power to run.
@d0Basic System Survey Probes can be crafted in the decoration tab of a constructor.\nYou must place the probe in your personal inventory to use.
<color=#00ff00>Drill core sample and deposit into connected container.</color>
I do not need any assistance at this time.\nNow, if you'll excuse me, I am very busy.
My targeting scanners are still being jammed. Have you destroyed enough of the crystals I've asked you to?\nWhy are you talking to me instead of out using that fancy drill of yours?

Thank you for speaking with me. I am trying to mine these rich asteroids but there is too much EM interference for my targeting systems to work properly.
I believe the interference is coming from those crystals you see scattered around the area.
@p9If you would take out some of those crystals using a handheld or vessel mounted drill, I think I would be able to continue mining.
I will pay you some credits plus give you a small amount of the ore I have mined so far.
You can keep whatever you find in those crystals.
Also if you have any friends helping you make sure they speak to me as well before you mine out any crystals.
I am sad to inform you that without enough crystals I cannot offer you payment.\nYou can deactivate the mission in your PDA. Perhaps you can find another miner in need.\nNow leave me be.
My targeting systems are working now but it wouldn't hurt if you destroy a few more crystals.
I will return once I've destroyed more crystals.

@q0The interference has cleared up considerably. A job well done.
As promised, I will transfer 25000 credits to your bank account.
I will also give you an assortment of ore I have found.
<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected to a storage container with enough free volume.</color>
@d0There is still too much interference.\nFind and remove the source of the interference. Check near the center of the mined out asteroid.
@d0This communication beacon appears to be operating normally.\nThere is nothing that needs to be done here.
@d0Warning: Signal strength poor.\nLocal radiation source detected.\nUnable to establish link to subspace communications network.
<color=#00ff00>I hear you. I fixed the beacon.</color>
@q0 @d0Subspace link established.\n\nHello? Is this thing working? Can anyone hear me?
@d0Radiation source detected near center of nearby asteroid shell.\nRemoving the source of radiation may improve signal strength.

@q0 @d0Oh thank you! We lost contact with this beacon and I was tasked with troubleshooting it.
I suppose some kind of payment is due. Please, take this for your troubles.
It looks like the beacon has captured some spare ore, so feel free to take that as well.
<color=#ffff00>Make sure you are connected to a storage container with enough free volume.</color>

@d0<color=#ff8000>Mining caches</color> can be obtained from Mining Sites.
Contents of the cache will be placed into your connected container.
Mining caches typically contain various ores and rarely mining related equipment.
<color=#ffff00>Place the caches into your personal inventory then connect to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.</color>

@d0<color=#ff0000>Combat caches</color> can be obtained from Combat Sites.
Contents of the cache will be placed into your connected container.
Combat caches typically contain various stolen goods and military equipment.
<color=#ffff00>Place the caches into your personal inventory then connect to a cargo container with plenty of free volume.</color>
Thank you for your earlier assistance. Our clients will be very happy.\nWe will finish up here then be on our way.
Welcome to our mining command vessel.\nAre you interested in some work?
What kind of work did you have in mind?

We were sent here to mine Chromite from this asteroid field but our miners went on strike and warped off, leaving us all alone here!
If you were to mine the Chromite for us and bring us 5 Chromite Ore Shipments we would pay you very well.
@p9You can find Chromite asteroids scattered throughout this asteroid field.
You can craft a Chromite Ore Shipment in the decoration tab of your constructor.
Then place 5 shipments in your personal inventory and speak with me again.
No thanks. Best of luck to you.
Excellent! Polaris thanks you for your assistance.\nAs promised, here is your reward of 500000 credits. And for such a job well done here is a little bonus for you as well.

@d0Occasionally during hacks I may detect a security vulnerability in the system that you can choose to exploit later. If such an option is available to you it will show up on the hacking menu.
<color=#00ffff>Security Resets:</color> These give you additional hacking attempts.
<color=#00ffff>Codebreakers:</color> Available when your guess is close to the actual code. Instantly hacks the system.
<color=#00ffff>High or Low Frequency Code Scanners:</color> Adjusts the maximum or minimum code range to be closer to the actual code. Only available when the difference between the code range and code is large enough.

@d0If you have any <color=#00ffff>hacking software</color> in your personal inventory, I can use it to find a random security vulnerability by overloading the system.
The hacking software will be used up and each type of hacking software may only be used once per terminal before the system adapts to it.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Overclock:</color> Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Fortify: </color>Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.
<color=#00ffff>Hacking Software: Spam: </color>Finds a random security vulnerability. Once per terminal.

@d0When you successfully hack a firewall in a multi-firewall system you increase your <color=#00ffff>hacking skill</color> up to a maximum amount.\n<color=#00ffff>Hacking skill</color> slightly reduces the initial variance between the minimum and maximum code range making it slightly easier to hack.\nYou currently get a {Eden_PlayerHackingSkill} reduction in the code variance due to your hacking skill.
Do you have any mining contracts available?

I am sorry, I do not currently have any contracts for you.\nI will be getting a new order of mining contracts in {DeltaTimeToString(System.Math.Abs(Eden_Timer + Eden_Global_ContractMineTimer - GetGameTimeInSec()))}
I want to ask something else.
Thank you, I will check back then.
I am sorry, but the UIM does not currently offer contracts for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
I want to ask something else.
Yes I do have a mining contract available for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
Yes I do have a mining contract for {Loc(GetFaction(LocalStructure.Entity.Id))}.
I want to ask something else.
No thanks. Keep your mining contract.
@q0Here is a mining contract. You should find it in your personal inventory or connected container.\nIt has instructions on how to complete it.
@q0Here is a mining contract. You should find it in your personal inventory or connected container.\nIt has instructions on how to complete it.
@d0This looks like the remote control for the television screen.
Change channel to Colonist News Network.
Change channel to Polaris News Agency.
Change channel to Federation Trade Network.
Change channel to Market News Daily.
Hello and welcome to this Federation Security Headquarters.\nHow may I assist you?
I collect popular and obscure music from around the galaxy.\nIf there's a universal language, music would be it.\nHave you heard any good tracks lately?
Unless you got a Syndicate Access Card or were invited by the boss himself you best keep walking friend.
I know I can beat him! Just waiting on him to make the first move then he's mine!
We've both been at a standstill for hours, waiting for the other to make the first move.\nBut I know he will flinch and make a mistake. That will be my chance to take him down.
We paid good money for VIP access and so far these two haven't made a single move!\nBoring!
Maybe you two should play the next round.
You know what? That's actually a great idea! I think we will do just that, thank you.
@d0The alien is too focused on his game to respond to you.
He and I are fairly evenly matched. It's really a tossup which one of us will win each time.\nI love it!
I you don't mind I really need to concentrate on the game.\nI can't let him beat me. Again.
HAH! Take that you slime ball! What's that? You going to go cry to someone? Hah!
This novice thinks he has a chance against me! Take a listen to his little insults! Hah!
Ah, welcome to the VIP section of this freeport.\nI hope the hospitality of the Syndicate has treated you well?
It has, but now I must be going.

Yes. Surely you have heard of our organization?
Here in the badlands different powers struggle for dominance.
My organization is just one such power, though we are the strongest.
@p9We focus on entertainment. We absolutely do not smuggle weapons, despite whatever rumors you may have heard.
We are a legitimate business and seek only to turn an honorable profit.
I want to ask something else.

A freeport is a free port of call where all are welcome.
The only rules here are no weapons and no killing.
@p9Some make this their home, selling their wares or services, while others are merely passing through.
The Syndicate constructed freeports such as these throughout the badlands as a gesture of goodwill to the various colonists and pirate clans that call the Badlands home.
@p9I would be lying if our goals were entirely... Selfless. We do this because it helps align others with the goals of the Syndicate.
After all, what good is power without friends to share it with?
Now if you excuse me, I have an important shipment of stolen weapons, I mean recovered medical supplies to attend to.
I want to ask something else.
Why here in a quarantine zone?

You stand in the hollow shell of what was once a small moon.
Centuries ago this moon was mined out by a group of miners that would eventually form Polaris.
Over the following years moon shells such as these became unstable and turned into navigational hazards.
@p9Polaris put up warning beacons to alert passing ships to the danger.
All the ore has since been mined out. No one comes here on purpose and the warning beacons keep away any who accidentally wander into the sector.
It's the perfect sanctuary for those who prefer freedom over the oppressive laws of the other major powers of the galaxy.
I want to ask something else.
I like to come up here to think. Sometimes I wonder what they are up to in the VIP section.
Ah yes, quite the view of... Asteroids.
I will leave you to enjoy the view.

This isn't just any asteroid. This used to be a small moon. Aren't you curious what happened to it? How it became like this, a mere hollow shell of its former glory?\nPerhaps it is a metaphor for our own existence. Do you ever wonder about that?
Hello. How may I help you?

I see. Well if you come across any interesting music tracks I would be willing to pay to add them to our collection.\nI heard some casinos ran by the Syndicate play some good music. Maybe you could try there?
I will keep an ear out. Thank you.
Ah you must be the Terran I was looking for!\nI assume you're here to deliver some wonderful new music samples for my ears?
<color=#00ff00>Here are some sample tracks from a DJ at the casino.</color>
How did you know I was coming?

I got a very excited message from a DJ at a Syndicate Casino. He was very happy to tell me that he sent a Terran fitting your description off to hand deliver his newest tracks.\nI would love to take a listen.

Thank you! Here at Underground Music Network we are always seeking the latest and hottest music.\nIf you find any more tracks I would be happy to take them off your hands.\nI have deposited 25000 credits to your bank account, and will put in a good word with any fellow pirate clans I come across.
I want to ask something else.
<color=#00ff00>I have more sample tracks for you.</color>
Could I get a copy of this music?

No, I'm afraid not. However I could promise you some credits.\nHave you heard of the Underground Music Network?\nThey can often be found in Pirate Freeports in the Badlands. If you were to take some of my music samples to them I'm sure they would reward you with some credits and street cred. What do you say?
Sure, I will take your tracks to them.
Sorry, I do not have the time.
That's okay, I understand.\nPerhaps you will come by again when you are feeling more generous?
I want to ask something else.

Here you go. Be careful with that, don't lose it! It's my only backup copy.\nTake it to a Pirate Freeport anywhere in the Badlands. You can find them on the solar system map marked with a white station icon within Pirates territory.
@d0This location shows no scannable objects of interest.\nTry a different moon, planet, or sector.
<color=#00ffff>Perform broad band scan.</color> Not for missions.
<color=#00ff00>Perform narrow band scan.</color> Requires an active mission.
Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.
@d0Scanner has been calibrated to scan for additional anomalies.\nReopen the scanner to start a new scan.
Additional anomalies detected. Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.

@d0You must have <color=#ffffff>{Eden_ProbeCount}</color> <color=#00ff00>{Eden_ProbeTypeLoc}</color> in your personal inventory.\nProbes can be crafted under the decorations tab of a constructor, bought at traders, or found as loot.
@d0Your scanners do not pick up any anomalies that can be scanned.\nIt may be possible to find more by exploring the area,
Additional anomalies detected. Calibrate scanner to scan for additional anomalies.
Input new X coordinate of scanner
Input new Y coordinate of scanner
Input new Z coordinate of scanner

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of the Free Colonists.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 2}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 3}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 4}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 5}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.

@q0 @d0Thank you for representing the Union of Independent Miners on behalf of Polaris.\nAs agreed we have transferred <color=#00ff00>{Eden_GlobalContractMineCredit * 20}</color> credits to your bank account. This contract is now fulfilled.\nHave a nice day.
@d0<color=#ff0000>The pod has run out of oxygen.</color>\nThere is nothing more you can do for them now. Return to the medical android on the freighter.
@d0You have no way of opening this escape pod.
Please hurry!\nMy ship's crew has only {DeltaTimeToString(Eden_OxygenTimer - GetGameTimeInSec())} oxygen remaining!

@q0The oxygen in the escape pods will have run out by now.\nWhile you were not able to rescue all the crew, I can reward you for those you did save.\nI will transfer {50000 * Eden_CrewCount} credits to your personal bank account as a thank you.
@q0The oxygen in the escape pods will have run out by now.\nIt is unfortunate you were not able to rescue any of them.

@q0Thank you for rescuing all of my crew!\nI will transfer {75000 * Eden_CrewCount} credits to your personal bank account as a thank you.\nI will also transfer some items from the ship's cargo hold to you. Make sure you are connected to a container with plenty of free space available.

Hello. I am a medical assist android model T-801. Not to be confused with the older T-800 models.\nMy crew abandoned ship and I seem to have found myself in quite the situation and could use your assistance, should you be willing.
<color=#00ff00>I am ready to find your missing crew. </color><color=#ffff00>(Starts timer)</color>
I want to ask something else.
What was wrong with the T-800 models?
How do I find the escape pods?
I want to ask something else.

From my limited understanding of scanning techniques, you will want to use a scanning station or Terran equivalent to interface with system probes.
I trust you have a scanning station on board that ship of yours? If not, I'm sure you can create one in your constructor.
You will need to perform a narrow band scan using your scanning station which will then display the position of an escape pod on your HUD.
Rescue the stranded crew, and then perform another scan and repeat the process until you've rescued all the crew.
@p9You will have only a limited time to rescue the crew before they run out of oxygen.
If you can only rescue some of them that is okay. Return to me even if you fail and I will still provide a reward for any crew you did manage to save.
I want to ask something else.
We don't talk about the T-800.
I think I've seen this movie.
Then I want to talk about something else.

I will give you the transponder codes and the password to open the escape pods.
You will have a limited amount of time to rescue my stranded crew from their escape pods once you start the mission.
You will need a scanning station and a large supply of <color=#00ff00>Advanced System Survey Probes</color>.
@p9<color=#ffff00>Be wary of periodic surges from the nebula that may overwhelm your ship's power systems and consider the fact we might not be alone.</color>
Are you ready to begin? Don't forget that you will want <color=#00ff00>Advanced System Survey Probes</color> before you accept this mission.

Greetings. How may I assist you?
Unfortunately our records show you are not well known enough to the Trade Federation for us to do business together.\nCome back when you have improved your reputation to at least friendly.

I sell trading frequencies to several types of factories. You can use those frequencies to initiate continuous scans for a specific factory, alerting you if the factory you are looking for is on the same planet or moon as yourself. These do not pinpoint the exact location but will let you know if it's worth exploring the planet or if it's better to move on to another planet.\n@p9You will also need to use a system survey probe to initiate the scan and will need to maintain at least friendly reputation with the Trade Federation.
I want to ask something else.
I want to ask something else.
Can you tell me about bulk trading?

Bulk trading involves ferrying extremely large trade goods from one galactic region to another to make a profit.
You will need a competent freighter with plenty of cargo space and the engines to move it to get the most out of each trip.
It will also help to be honored with the factions you are trading with as you may get a better price.
@p9There are two types of bulk trading: Sealed packages and factory goods.
Sealed packages can be purchased from Trade Federation distribution headquarters in Tranquility and are then delivered to the distribution center of another faction. The size of sealed packages you can purchase will depend on your reputation.
Factory goods can be purchased from various orbital bulk factories in one region and sold to the orbital bulk factories of another region.
I want to ask something else.

Head to a Distribution Headquarters in a Trading Station sector inside Trade Federation territory in Tranquility.
Trading Station sectors show up on the solar system map as a white station symbol.
Speak to the traders there for the faction you want to deliver to and pay any collateral that is asked.
@p9Then head to a Distribution Center in a Trading Station sector in the territory of the faction you are delivering to. Sell it to them to get back your collateral plus a small fee for your services.
@p9A certain reputation level is required before you are allowed to fulfill delivery contracts.
Small packages require neutral with the Trade Federation.
Medium packages require friendly.
Large packages require honored.
You will also need to be neutral, friendly, or honored with the faction you are delivering to, so double check your reputation before accepting a delivery contract.
How do I trade sealed packages?

I thank you for your previous assistance, even if you are a Terran.

I have brought shame to my house by allowing myself to be taken alive.\nI would ask if you will bring me a handheld <color=#00ff00>Minigun</color> and 750 <color=#00ff00>8.3mm Minigun Round</color>, so that I may regain my honor by slaughtering my foes?
I don't have what you ask for.

Thank you. You're not bad, for a Terran.\nHonor demands I give you payment for what you offer me. Have this as a token of my gratitude. The cultists did not consider it worth removing.\nBut make no mistake, when next we meet it may not be as friends.

I have brought shame to my house by allowing myself to be taken alive.\nI would ask if you will bring me a handheld <color=#00ff00>Shotgun</color> and 60 <color=#00ff00>Shotgun Shell</color>, so that I may regain my honor by meeting my foes in head to head combat?
I don't have what you ask for.

I have brought shame to my house by allowing myself to be taken alive.\nI would ask if you will bring me a handheld <color=#00ff00>Sniper Rifle </color>and 25 <color=#00ff00>12.7mm Sniper Round</color>, so that I may regain my honor by exterminating the enemy?
I don't have what you ask for.
Thank you so much for freeing me!\nI should be fine from here.

Please you have to help me! These cultists abducted me! I think they were planning to sacrifice me in one of their altars.\nIf you were to bring me 20 <color=#00ff00>Electronics</color> and 2 <color=#00ff00>High-Output Capacitor</color> I can put together a transmitter to call a nearby Trade Federation ship to rescue me.

Thank you for the rescue Terran!\nMy ship is parked not too far away. I think I can make it there on foot but I do not have enough fuel to escape the system.\nIf you were to bring me 20 Fuel Cell and 25 Refined Pentaxid I would be very, very thankful.

Oh thank you for the rescue. I thought they were going to eat me for dinner!\nI came to this planet to colonize it, but the cultists took all my survival equipment.\nIf you were to give me a <color=#00ff00>Multitool</color>, a <color=#00ff00>Mechanical Drill</color>, and a <color=#00ff00>Chainsaw</color> I should be able to make it on my own.
Good luck making it back to your ship.
Good luck out there. It's a scary planet.

Ah this is great, isn't it? Starting fresh, on a new world? Danger around every corner?\nThis is what I live for!\nThe cultists didn't take everything off of me. Here, have these, you may find them useful.

Well then, time to connect the flux-capacitor to the radio array, reverse the polarity of the Higgs-Boson compensator, and...\nOh, you probably want a reward? Here, have these credits. The cultists didn't see the value in them.
This will get me out of this rotten place!\nNever should have accepted this survey assignment from Polaris.\nWell, thank you! Here, take this. A little something I had on me.

<color=#00ffff>Ancient Warp Gate matter transmission:</color> Enabling this option allows players to use the ancient warp gate to store basic supplies in a matter buffer for transfer through the gate. <color=#ffffff>Default:</color> <color=#00ff00>On</color>.

@d0Welcome to the Industrial Water Extractor Version 2.0 setup wizard! I will guide you on your journey to setting up your very own industrial grade water extractor! Would you like to use the setup wizard, or do you want to do it on your own? Note: When you perform the survey, you will need to be connected to a BASE cargo container, NOT a ship's.
<color=#00ff00>I already know what to do. Start the survey.</color>

<color=#ffff00>Yes. Perform a full reset. (CANNOT BE UNDONE)</color>
@d0Lock code bypassed with Project Eden Admin Access Card.\nYou now have access to the debug menu of this device.

@d0Now I will walk you through step by step instructions to activate your new Industrial Water Extractor. Step 1: Make sure your base is within logistics range of a biome called either Lake (English client) or Water (non-localized). You can see your current biome in the upper right corner of your on-screen HUD. Lake biomes are typically found near large bodies of deeper water, possible a couple hundred meters from shoreline. This can vary from planet to planet. Don't confuse it with an actual lake, the lake biome can be found in the ocean too. @p9 @d0You can use the Connect to Base option in the build menu (N) to place wireless extenders along the ocean floor to increase the range of your logistics so that you can remain within logistics range while entering a Lake biome even if your base is along the shore. Go ahead and make sure you have wireless reach to a Lake biome now and then come back once you are ready for step 2.

@d0Step 2: Next you will need to connect via logistics to a cargo container on your base with at least 32000 free volume capacity. A standard cargo container won't be large enough so make sure you use a container controller with several container extenders. If you are unsure how to connect to containers using the logistics menu, there are tutorials online. Once you are able to connect to a logistics menu in a location where you enter a Lake biome, you may continue the setup wizard. Note: Do not attempt to connect to a ship's cargo container. The water report may overload your ship's generators. You may be flying a ship to perform the survey, but make sure you are connected to the cargo on a BASE.

@d0<color=#00ffff>Step 3:</color> Now it's time to perform a survey which gives you the water report you'll need to upgrade this extractor.
Equip an <color=#00ff00>Advanced Multitool</color> in your personal toolbar, you will need to use this to upgrade the extractor.
Make sure you are connected to the cargo container, and that your personal toolbar is active.
Are you ready to proceed?

@d0<color=#00ffff>Step 4:</color> You now need to perform a water survey to make sure you are in a valid build location for the extractor.
Once you activate the survey, a new PDA mission will start.
To complete the mission, you need to cross into a Lake biome from a different biome.
You can cross from Deep Water to Lake, or Shallow Water to Lake, or any other combination as long as you are going from any other biome, into a Lake biome.
@p9 @d0The moment you cross the threshold, a water report will be deposited into your connected container.
Return to the extractor and use the upgrade function of your multitool to upgrade the extractor to an active version.
You must do this within 2 minutes of receiving the report or it will spoil.
If you miss it don't worry! You can always activate the survey again.

@d0<color=#00ffff>Step 5:</color> After upgrading your extractor, interact with it and follow the on-screen instructions to finish setting up your extractor.\nThis will make that extractor your <color=#00ff00>primary extractor</color> where you will manage your extractor fuel, production, and any upgrades.\nEnjoy!
@d0<color=#ffff00>You must pause extraction and empty all cargo before you can access the upgrade menu.</color>
